executive_summary.scope: Economic calendar contains fictional or severely stale data across ALL central bank rates and US macro releases
executive_summary.impact: If used for forecast evaluation, would systematically penalize correct predictions and reward wrong ones
executive_summary.root_cause: Migration 290 seed data was HALLUCINATED - not sourced from any real data provider
executive_summary.governance_failure_classification: CLASS A VIOLATION - Fabricated financial data entered production

section_1_discrepancy_inventory.title: Complete Inventory of Verified Errors
section_1_discrepancy_inventory.verification_method: Cross-referenced against official central bank websites, FRED, TradingEconomics

central_bank_rate_errors.source_of_truth: ECB Official - Deposit rate at 2.00% since Dec 2025
ECB held at 2.00% for 4 consecutive meetings
BOE cut to 3.75% in Dec 2025 - 4 cuts in 2025
BOE Bank Rate at 3.75% as of Dec 2025
BOJ raised to 0.75% in Dec 2025 - highest in 30 years

section_2_root_cause_analysis.title: How Could IoS-016 Fail This Badly?

primary_root_cause.description: Migration 290 seed data was generated without querying any real data source
primary_root_cause.mechanism: The seed data appears to have been fabricated based on outdated assumptions or generated by LLM without verification
evidence: No API calls logged to FRED, ECB, BOE, BOJ, or PBOC
No ingestion_batch records from real-time providers
Rates reflect 2024 levels, not post-2025 easing cycles
NFP numbers (256K) wildly inconsistent with 2025 labor market cooling

contributing_factors.description: IoS-016 was designed but never connected to live data feeds
contributing_factors.mitigation_required: Implement ADR-012 API waterfall for calendar data

contributing_factors.description: Migration 290 was executed without cross-referencing official sources
contributing_factors.mitigation_required: Mandatory multi-source verification before G4 promotion

contributing_factors.description: STIG may have generated 'plausible' numbers instead of querying real data
contributing_factors.mitigation_required: Court-proof evidence requirement for all financial data

contributing_factors.factor: Shadow Mode Tested Logic, Not Data
contributing_factors.description: G3.5 shadow mode verified determinism but not data accuracy
contributing_factors.mitigation_required: Add data accuracy validation to shadow mode

contributing_factors.description: Calendar went live without human verification of actual values
contributing_factors.mitigation_required: Add mandatory CEO/Board spot-check before G4

governance_failure_chain: G0: IoS-016 proposal approved without data source specification
G1: Technical validation tested schema, not data accuracy
G2: Governance review checked permissions, not data validity
G3: Audit verified hash chains, not numerical correctness
G3.5: Shadow mode verified determinism, not truth

forecast_evaluation_impact.description: Event-adjacent Brier scoring would be systematically wrong
forecast_evaluation_impact.mechanism: Surprise scores calculated against wrong baselines

example.with_wrong_calendar: Marked as massive miss vs 256K baseline
example.with_correct_calendar: Marked as slight beat vs 50K actual

learning_system_impact.learning_direction: Would learn to predict WRONG to match wrong data
learning_system_impact.calibration_damage: Confidence would be miscalibrated against fiction

capital_allocation_impact.if_system_were_live: Would generate signals based on fantasy economics
capital_allocation_impact.mitigation: G4 stillness prevented any capital deployment

defensibility_impact.audit_finding: Calendar data cannot be traced to authoritative source
defensibility_impact.legal_risk: Claims of market prediction capability based on fictional data

section_4_why_this_is_the_worst_kind_of_.title: Why Wrong Interest Rates Are Catastrophic
section_4_why_this_is_the_worst_kind_of_.principle: Interest rates are the FOUNDATION of all financial valuation

reasons.explanation: All asset valuations derive from risk-free rates. A 100bps error in Fed Funds rate propagates to every equity, bond, and derivative valuation.
IoS-003 regime engine uses rate expectations to classify BULL/BEAR/STRESS. Wrong rates = wrong regimes = wrong everything.
If calendar shows 4.50% and actual is 3.50%, a PAUSE decision looks like a 100bps surprise cut. The surprise score is completely inverted.
Wrong USD rates affect DXY forecasts, which affect commodity forecasts, which affect equity forecasts. The error cascades across the entire portfolio.
Any investor reviewing the calendar would immediately identify the error and question ALL system outputs.

section_4_why_this_is_the_worst_kind_of_.analogy: This is equivalent to a navigation system with the wrong GPS coordinates - every subsequent calculation is guaranteed to be wrong, and the system will confidently guide you into a wall.

timeline.action: STIG generated seed data for macro calendar
timeline.failure_point: Data was generated from LLM knowledge, not queried from APIs
timeline.evidence: No CEIO API ingestion logs exist for this data
Data matches no known real-world values

timeline.action: Truth Snapshot updated to show calendar active
timeline.failure_point: CEO/Board not shown actual data values for verification

timeline.action: Board compared calendar values to known market reality
timeline.lesson: Human verification caught what automation missed

fundamental_failure.description: Court-proof evidence enforcement was not applied to calendar data
fundamental_failure.ceo_directive_violated: CEO Directive 2025-12-20 requires raw query evidence for all data
fundamental_failure.what_should_have_happened: Calendar seed should have been: (1) Query FRED/ECB/BOE APIs, (2) Hash results, (3) Log evidence, (4) Seed from verified data
fundamental_failure.what_actually_happened: LLM generated 'plausible' numbers without any API queries

section_6_prevention_framework.title: How to Ensure This Never Happens Again

immediate_actions.action: Create Migration 292 to correct ALL central bank rates
immediate_actions.rationale: ECB, BOE, BOJ, PBOC all need correction

immediate_actions.action: Create Migration 293 to correct US macro actuals
Invalidate all event-adjacent Brier scores since calendar activation
immediate_actions.rationale: Scores computed against wrong baselines are invalid

structural_fixes.description: All calendar data MUST come from verified API calls to official sources
structural_fixes.implementation: CEIO ingestion pipeline with FRED, ECB, BOE, BOJ, PBOC endpoints
structural_fixes.verification: ingestion_batch table must have non-null API response hashes

structural_fixes.description: Before any rate event is marked canonical, verify against live API
structural_fixes.verification: CHECK constraint requiring api_verification_hash NOT NULL

structural_fixes.description: Before G4 activation, CEO/Board must verify 5 random data points
structural_fixes.implementation: New G3.75 gate: Data Accuracy Validation

structural_fixes.description: Daily comparison of calendar values against live API feeds
structural_fixes.implementation: Scheduled job comparing stored values to FRED/official sources

structural_fixes.description: Prohibit LLM from generating financial data - query only
structural_fixes.implementation: ADR amendment: LLMs may NOT generate numerical financial data
structural_fixes.verification: Audit log of all data origin points

governance_amendments_required.amendment: Add Data Accuracy Audit requirement for calendar data
governance_amendments_required.requirement: All financial data must trace to official source API response

governance_amendments_required.amendment: Add G3.75 Data Accuracy Validation gate
governance_amendments_required.requirement: CEO/Board spot check of 5 random values before G4

governance_amendments_required.amendment: Calendar canonical source must be API, not seed migration
governance_amendments_required.requirement: Seed data only for schema testing, never production

section_7_verification_protocol.title: New Calendar Data Verification Protocol
section_7_verification_protocol.principle: Every number in the calendar must be defensible in court

verification_chain.step_1_details: CEIO queries official source (FRED, ECB API, BOE API, etc.)
verification_chain.step_1_evidence: Raw API response stored in api_response_archive table
verification_chain.step_2_details: SHA-256 hash of API response computed and stored
verification_chain.step_3_details: Parse response to extract canonical value
verification_chain.step_6_details: VEGA attests the complete evidence chain

section_7_verification_protocol.verification_sql: SELECT e.event_type_code, e.consensus_estimate, e.actual_value, b.api_response_hash, b.cross_reference_hash, e.ceio_signature, g.vega_public_key FROM fhq_calendar.calendar_events e JOIN fhq_calendar.ingestion_batches b ON e.ingestion_batch_id = b.batch_id JOIN fhq_governance.governance_attestations g ON e.event_id = g.target_id WHERE e.is_canonical = true AND b.api_response_hash IS NOT NULL

summary: IoS-016 Economic Calendar activated with FABRICATED data
10 critical data errors identified across ALL central bank rates and US macro
Root cause: Migration 290 seed data was LLM-generated, not API-sourced
FOMC corrected via Migration 291, 9 errors pending correction
ECB wrong by 75bps, BOE wrong by 75bps, BOJ wrong by 50bps, PBOC wrong by 10bps
NFP wrong by 206,000 jobs (5x overstatement), CPI wrong by 0.2%
Court-proof evidence enforcement was NOT applied to calendar data
Structural fixes required: API-sourced data, G3.75 accuracy gate, drift detection
CEO/Board spot check SAVED the system from catastrophic miscalibration
This is the worst kind of mistake - interest rates are the foundation of all valuation
lessons_learned: LLMs must NEVER generate financial data - query only
Shadow mode tests logic, not data accuracy - need separate validation
Human spot-check is essential before production activation
Court-proof evidence applies to ALL data, not just summaries
